response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its value to be far beyond $10,000. However, for this exclusive opportunity, I am offering it to you at an exceptional price of $15,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best value while also allowing us to share in the benefits of such a strategic partnership. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any way I can provide more information about how this product can meet your specific needs.", "product_price": 15000}
